name: WeFarm: More than Farming
description:
Want to grow your own farm, feed animals, make new friends and explore a stunning, wacky world? Then play WeFarm – it’s much more than just a farming game!

In WeFarm you can:
• Create the farm of your dreams
• Complete quests and earn valuable items to help expand your farm
• Meet and help quirky neighbors, each with their own zany personalities
• Discover something new every day in the many vast locations in Woodland Springs
• Design your own unique farm with tons of decorations to choose from
• Dress to impress with cool clothes and themed outfits to customize your cute character
• Make friends with fellow farmers from around the globe in real-time.

Play WeFarm and enter a wacky world filled with fun and surprises around every corner.

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at wefarm_en@customerservice-bigpoint.com
